mapper.select: select OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_BATCH as IMPORT_BATCH, OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_PERSON_ID as IMPORT_PERSON_ID, OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_TIME as IMPORT_TIME, OC_IMPORT_BATCH.TASK_TYPE as TASK_TYPE, OC_IMPORT_BATCH.BATCH_FLAG as BATCH_FLAG, ucc_users.nick_name as IMPORT_PERSON_NAME from OC_IMPORT_BATCH as OC_IMPORT_BATCH left join ucc_users as ucc_users on ucc_users.user_id = OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_PERSON_ID where OC_IMPORT_BATCH.BATCH_FLAG = '0' and OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_PERSON_ID = #{importPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_TIME DESC

select OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_BATCH as IMPORT_BATCH, OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_PERSON_ID as IMPORT_PERSON_ID, OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_TIME as IMPORT_TIME, OC_IMPORT_BATCH.TASK_TYPE as TASK_TYPE, OC_IMPORT_BATCH.BATCH_FLAG as BATCH_FLAG, ucc_users.nick_name as IMPORT_PERSON_NAME from OC_IMPORT_BATCH as OC_IMPORT_BATCH left join ucc_users as ucc_users on ucc_users.user_id = OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_PERSON_ID where 1=1
order by OC_IMPORT_BATCH.IMPORT_TIME DESC
mapper.delete: delete from OC_IMPORT_BATCH where IMPORT_BATCH in ( ${importBarchs} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT IMPORT_BATCH FROM OC_TASK_DETAIL union SELECT DISTINCT IMPORT_BATCH FROM OC_TASK_RECORD WHERE RECORD_TIME BETWEEN DATE_ADD(sysdate(),INTERVAL -2 DAY) and sysdate()
